lipermi.net
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  lipermi.net.Server

public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

The LipeRMI server. This object listen to a specific port and when a client connects it delegates the connection to a ConnectionHandler.

Author:
lipe
See Also:
lipermi.net.CallHandler, Client
